attributes.action: reduce the amount of light pollution in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The point of this petition is to raise awareness of the amount of light pollution being caused in today's society.

Not only are the lights being used outdoors unfriendly to the environment by generating waste but are also proving to cause some health problems such as headaches, visual acuity and hypertension to name just a few.

Light pollution also interferes with the study of astronomical observatories which could lead to a better understanding of our universe.
